text:
🚨Sen. Tom Cotton lists first declassifications Kash Patel must make as FBI Director:

"The FBI needs to address: Crossfire Hurricane in 2016.. Lawfare against Trump.. Mar-a-Lago raid.. Left-wing malitia protests.. Arresting Pro-Life protestors outside of abortion clinics."
🚨BREAKING: DC police report that thousands of officers nationwide are willing to attend and support President Trump’s Inauguration day.
They’ve got to honor the Confederacy before they can bring down the cost of bacon!
Do you support Alvin Bragg getting prosecuted for what he did to Daniel Penny and Donald Trump ?

.   discussed how to approach TDS sufferers today on his live stream. 

Summary:

- Change the frame from Trump is evil to the news is fake.

- Show the hoax list.

- Explain the Fine People Hoax has been debunked by Snopes, Ackman, Rogan, Musk and that many other prominent figures voted for Trump because they found out it was a hoax.

- Show them The American Debunk site, which debunks dozens of hoaxes.

- Ask “if anything they say is true, why are Democrats so happy about a peaceful transfer of power?”

I’ll make one addition:

Bring the person to the Hoaxology page at The American Debunk site. 

This page teaches the main hoax techniques that are used to create and spread hoaxes. 

Hoaxology has been super effective per the feedback I’ve received.

Here’s a sample of what you’ll find at our Hoaxology page:
If he doesn’t stop with this nonsense, I’m going to cancel his hair stylist expense account. Vicious, I know, but …

🟥🟥🟥 
RYSSLAND och ISLAM är demokratins dödgrävare!!
⬛️⬛️⬛️ 
Musk och Trump vill stärka västvärlden.
🟥🟥🟥
Miljöpartiet, Die Grünen m.fl. ruinerar EU med idiotiska klimatåtgärder.
🟩🟩🟩
The Trump effect at work. It can't be denied.
